name: Skeleton Wave
description:
Skeleton Wave - You are a villager. Your task is to survive as many waves with skeletons as possible. Defend your home, fight hordes of skeletons using the AK-47. With each wave passed, the skeletons become faster and stronger, as well as their army increases.

  • 8 waves of enemies
  • Increasing difficulty
  • Nice graphics
  • Sound effects
